Description: One or more yield types separated by a comma.
Name: YieldType

Description: The amount of yield change.  Must be either a single value or multiple to match each yield type.
Name: Amount

Description: When set to true, the unit no longer accrues resource maintenance.
Name: Ignore

Description: The integer percent value of resistance to damage from a WMD blast.
Name: Blast

Description: The integer percent value of resistance to damage from WMD fallout.
Name: Fallout

Description: The integer percent value of resistance to damage from water
Name: WaterDamage

Description: The Hero Class to grant.
Name: HeroClassType

Description: The Building in the city that the Hero will spawn at and be linked with.
Name: LocationBuildingType

Description: The type of Resource the product is made from.
Name: ResourceType

Description: Whether or not to override with unique units
Name: UniqueOverride

Description: Whether or not to override with unique units
Name: UniqueOverride

Description: The Hero Class to grant.
Name: HeroClassType

Description: The delta amount of pressure to modify the strength.
Name: Amount

Description: If true, the effect will apply the value to the Governor's external domestic pressure.
Name: DomesticCities

Description: If true, the effect will apply only once per
Name: ForeignCities

Description: The delta amount to change the city's current Loyalty
Name: Amount

Description: If true, the effect will apply to the victor's city, if false it will apply to the enemy's city
Name: AffectLocal

Description: Adds an additional amount against targets in a golden age
Name: AdditionalGoldenAge

Description: The delta amount to change the city's current Loyalty
Name: Amount

Description: If true, the effect will apply to the victor's city, if false it will apply to the enemy's city
Name: AffectLocal

Description: Whether or not the terrain type is valid to move into.
Name: Valid

Description: The integer percent value of discount on strategic resources required for unit production
Name: Amount

Description: A boolean value indicating if the effect only pertains to the target player.
Name: TargetOnly

Description: If TargetOnly == true, this is the value to set the target player's WMD count(s) to.
Name: Amount

Description: A text value indicating the Governor type that grants favor when promoted.
Name: GovernorType

Description: A boolean value determining if the Governor type should be neutralized.
Name: Neutralize

Description: An integer value indicating the amount of favor gained when the specified governor is promoted
Name: FavorAmount

Description: A text value indicating the YieldType to be banned from player use.
Name: YieldType

Description: A text value indicating the YieldType to be banned from player use.
Name: YieldType

Description: An integer value indicating the cost discount for the specified yield type.
Name: Amount

Description: A boolean value indicating if the effect only pertains to the target player.
Name: ResourceType

Description: Amount to adjust the extra accumulation modifier.
Name: Amount

Description: The integer percent value of discount on strategic resources required for unit upgrades
Name: Amount

Description: BY_COMBAT, BY_GIFT, BY_LIBERATION, BY_CULTURAL_IDENTITY, BY_SETTLER
Name: TransferType

Description: If set, the requirement will ignore checking the player's cities.
Name: IgnoreCities

Description: If set, the requirement will ignore checking the player's units.
Name: IgnoreUnits

Description: If defined, the player must possess at least 1 'UnitType' or (if IgnoreCities is false) the player must possess at least one city.
Name: UnitType

Description: The tag to match against.
Name: Tag

Description: Whether or not to include the center hex.
Name: IncludeCenter

Description: The unit type to match against.  Includes replacement types but not base types.
Name: UnitType

Description: Whether or not to include the center hex.
Name: IncludeCenter

Description: The terrain class expected.
Name: TerrainClass

Description: The type of the district to check for.
Name: DistrictType

Description: Whether or not the district must be an exact match or if it can be a replacement district.
Name: ExactMatch

Description: Require the district to be functioning (not pillaged).
Name: MustBeFunctioning

Description: The provided amount.
Name: Amount

Description: Require the district to be functioning (not pillaged).
Name: MustBeFunctioning

Description: Type of Age: GOLDEN, DARK, NONE
Name: Type

Description: The tag to check that the district contains.
Name: Tag

Description: Require the district be functioning (not pillaged).
Name: MustBeFunctioning

Name: DistrictType

Name: ExactMatch

Description: Require the district be functioning (not pillaged).
Name: MustBeFunctioning

Description: Require that the district be functioning (not pillaged).
